column1: The funeral service will be held Monday
column4: at 11:00 AM at Calvary Baptist Church
column5: with the Rev. Alex L. Martin and the Rev. Justin Nelson officiating. Burial will follow at Skyline Memory Gardens
column6: with military honors by the VFW Memorial Honor Guard. The family will receive friends Monday from 9:30 until 11:00 AM at the church. The family wishes to express their gratitude for the love and compassion shown by Dr. David Dixon and the Skilled Nursing Staff at Northern Hospital of Surry County.
